Content: I loved this app until the recent updates. I do not like the changes at all. I had everything set perfectly for the past few years. Now I have to hit "list" every time I open the app. There used to be a setting that made it my permanent choice. I view weather a few times daily, sometimes. I also do not like the visual. The type and graphics seem less bold.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
